name: Alien RPG
description: This is my first game using Construct 3 , and the first game I upload . It was made in 5 days in a coding club . Arrows to move , right mouse button to attack with the sword , left mouse button to shoot fireballs . The stairs go to the dungeon . I don't plan to work more on this game , I just want to try to upload something on Itch.io to plan for future projects .
